div.style: border: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; max-height: 0; overflow: hidden;

table.style: border-collapse: collapse; border-top: 1px solid #e2e8f0; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #2563eb; color: #ffffff; padding: 3px 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 7pt; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 0.5px; text-transform: uppercase;

td.style: text-align: right; vertical-align: middle; width: 50%; padding: 5px 0;
